txt.en: Turgon recently spied a group of Orcs from the Harlond on their way to a crack in the southern Rammas and asks that they not make it across to Pelennor Fields.
Turgon can be found at the southern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Turgon.
Keep your post and defend the southern Rammas
The nearby crack in the Rammas is located in the south-western end of the Out-wall.\n\nYou should defend the crack in the southern Rammas from the Harlond Orcs.
You have successfully defended the southern Rammas
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not leave the crack in the southern Rammas unguarded</rgb>
Do not let the Orcs of the Harlond reach the Pelennor
You have left the southern Rammas unguarded

'The Rammas is safe for now. I will send some of my men to protect the break in the wall and start repairs as soon as we are able.\n\n'I thank you for your assistance. You are a good friend. I will fight by your side any day that I am not tasked with defending this wall.'
'[placeholder], the Morgul forces occupying the Harlond have breached the southern Rammas! We must hold them back. Will you defend the Rammas?!'
The nearby crack in the Rammas is located in the south-western end of the Out-wall.\n\nYou should defend the crack in the southern Rammas from the Harlond Orcs.
